content: 3 different crochet mushrooms all using the same pattern i made a little brown mushroom a spotted red amanita inspired mushroom and an orange chanterelle inspired mushroom for the brown mushroom i used a brown yarn fittingly called mushroom from red heart super saver for the cap and i used a super light greyish tan called oatmeal for the stem also from red heart super saver for the amanita mushroom i used cherry red for the cap and a cream color called aran for the stem and spots both from red heart and to make the chanterelle i used premier just yarn the one they have at dollar tree in marmalade for the cap and red heart cornmeal for the stem you can probably make a few other sorts of mushrooms using this same method by simply mixing and matching the cap styles and the different colors a video tutorial is available on my youtube channel at the link
